title: How It Works
subtitle: Understand the rules, scoring system, and fairness features that make Quiniela a transparent and fun prediction game.

winner.title: How the Winner is Picked
winner.intro: The winner is determined by points first, then by the goal prediction tiebreaker. Here's how it works:

points.title: Points First
points.description: Each correct match prediction (Home/Draw/Away) earns you 1 point. The player with the most points at the end of the week leads.

tiebreaker.title: Goal Tiebreaker
tiebreaker.description: If players are tied on points, the one whose total goals prediction is closest to the actual total wins.

split.title: Prize Split
split.description: If players are still tied after the tiebreaker, the prize is split equally among all tied winners.

example.title: Example:
example.player1: Player A: 7 points, predicted 21 total goals
example.player2: Player B: 7 points, predicted 25 total goals
example.result: Actual total goals: 22 → Player A wins (closer: |21-22|=1 vs |25-22|=3)

goals.title: How Total Goals are Calculated
goals.intro: Your total goals prediction is compared against the sum of all goals scored in all 9 matches of the week. This includes goals from both teams in every match.

tip.title: Pro Tip:
tip.description: Liga MX averages about 2.5 goals per match, so 22-24 total goals is a common prediction for 9 matches.

lockout.title: Countdown & Betting Lockout
lockout.intro: To ensure fair play, betting closes 5 minutes before the first match of the week begins. The countdown timer on the Dashboard shows exactly how much time you have left.
lockout.note: The lockout time is calculated from the server, so everyone sees the same countdown regardless of their timezone.

fairness.title: Why the System is Fair & Safe
fairness.intro: Quiniela is designed with fairness as the top priority. Multiple safeguards ensure no one can cheat or gain unfair advantages.

privacy.title: Prediction Privacy
privacy.description: No one can see other players' predictions. Your choices are private until the week is settled. This prevents copying strategies.

timing.title: Server-Side Lockout
timing.description: The betting lockout is enforced on the server, not just the app. Even if someone tries to manipulate the interface, the API rejects late bets.

noCheat.title: No Late Changes
noCheat.description: Once the first match starts, predictions are permanently locked. No one—not even admins—can modify predictions after lockout.

visibility.title: What You Can & Can't See

canSee.title: You CAN See
canSee.own: Your own predictions and payment status
canSee.schedule: The match schedule and kickoff times
canSee.results: Final match results after games end

visibility.note: This privacy design ensures everyone makes independent predictions based on their own analysis, not by copying others.

settlement.title: Admin Settlement Process
settlement.intro: After all matches in a week are completed, the administrator settles the week to finalize results and determine the winner.

process.title: Settlement Process:
process.step1: Admin verifies all match results are correct (from API Football)
process.step2: System calculates final points for all participants
process.step3: Tiebreaker is applied if needed (closest total goals)
process.step4: Winner(s) are announced and prize is distributed

settlement.note: Settlement is typically done within 24 hours after the last match of the week ends.

pdf.title: PDF Reports
pdf.intro: Download official PDF reports to keep a record of predictions and results for each week.

predictions.title: Predictions PDF
predictions.description: Available before the first match starts. Shows all participants' predictions (L/E/V), total goals guess, and payment status.
predictions.use: Use this to verify everyone's predictions are locked in before games begin.

results.title: Results PDF
results.description: Available after the week is settled. Shows final standings with points, correct/wrong predictions (green/red), and the winner highlighted in yellow.
results.verified: Includes 'Approved and Verified by' with the admin's name and timestamp for authenticity.

download.title: How to Download
download.step2: Look for the PDF download buttons in the week info section
download.step3: Click 'Predictions PDF' before games or 'Results PDF' after settlement

pdf.note: PDFs provide a transparent, printable record that can be shared with all participants.

cta.title: Ready to Play?
cta.description: Now that you understand how everything works, jump into the action!
